WRITING.TEXT: When I started I could barely run five minutes. It takes more work for us, but we can do it too!
I never liked sports before.. But now I make myself small goals and every time go a bit higher, keep the challenges dynamic but doable
I don't use my inhaler too much as I try not to depend on it. I do have it with me just in case
Have fun!
10k! Wow!! I admire you.

WRITING.TITLE: Today I was going to run my first 5k but then...
WRITING.TEXT:
...I decided I could do more, so I ran 6k!
Sorry, I kind of needed to brag! I did it in 44 minutes. I have asthma. If I can do this, anybody can, no matter how long it takes you!

We were going out almost every single day as friends for a few weeks. One day we were sitting at a cute cozy coffee house, having awesome conversation and just a great time overall. At one point he looked at me, smiled, and just took my hands from across the table, held them and caressed me a little bit. It definitely started a spark in me!
True. Wish you the best of luck, thanks for the advice.
Totally agree about the body language. Being together even if doing nothing is just the best after a long day and one of the things I miss the most.
Yes, you're right. It's just that I miss him so much sometimes

We are on a LDR with 10 hour time difference, which obviously makes it hard to speak. However I know sometimes he could make a few minutes to speak and he doesn't. It has only happened the last few days but it's annoying. There are very few hours during the day when we are both awake, and I really love hearing him in the morning, always makes for a much better day.
I mean aside from all the obvious ones like kissing, making love and just being with him, a major one for me is showering together... I just love it so much.

Its nice to see you put work on your legs! It feels like most of the guys at my gym barely do anything for it, and get big everywhere but the legs. As a woman I really like your kind of body way better!
I had no change in sex drive, but I wasn't getting wet as usual. Buy some good quality lube, that should do the trick. Also, make your partner aware of the situation so they know and can help.
You can do it!! Keep moisturizer with you at all times, and aquaphor. Best wishes
I used one called curatane, 40mg, 126 lbs
For me also when I get embarrassed... Very annoying. Also, I can't even tell a white lie without blushing. Have you washed the dishes? Yes. Bam! Face turns bright red. Also.my chest AMD arms flsuh!
Awesome! Thanks for replying ;)

WRITING.TITLE: I just finished my treatment and had a few questions
WRITING.TEXT: Today I took my last accutane pill. I did 40mg for six months. Extremely successful, I've been clear since a month and a half in, and the side effects were really not bad. I want to hear from people who finished accutane, how long did it take for the dryness on your lips to go away? I also have a question about skin and hair. Since taking accutane my skin and hair went from extremely horribly oily to normal. Did this go back to the original oiliness for you? Stay normal? Somewhere in between? Thanks everybody
Its a side effect, flushing. Your skin is very thin, so your blood vessels are more visible. I flush not only on my face but also on my chest and arms
Well I was meaning to say thanks and couldn't find you! I've had the drink every night since. So thank you very much!!
Now I really wish I lived in Canada... Hehe
I like thus drink Somebody posted a few days ago, and I tried it. Just make some peppermint tea, add some milk and about half a tea spoon of cocoa powder. Sweeten the way you like, I just do stevia
Wax gives longer lasting results, I'd go for that.
If I were in your place I would.look into taking accutane.
I use a micellar solution on a cotton bud, preferably the kind with the pointed tip
To avoid stomach pain you need to take accutane with a meal, that also included some fat. Don't take it just with a cup of coffee.

I was cheated on as well, and I understand where you're coming from. What helped me was basically being honest with my current SO. He knows what happened, and therefore understands my fears. I assume that if right now you're still with your current SO, you do trust her. Now, its not going to be easy, but you will have to somewhat out yourself in her hands. If you ever feel these kind of feelings coming, you should talk about it with her. She needs to understand, and if she doesn't, maybe she's not for you. Being cheated on can cause quite the trauma, so you need somebody who understands it and will be patient with you.
Stay happy and healthy, both of you. She's beautiful

Exercise... Food is easy for me, once I get used to it its really simple! I find it much easier to like, not eat from the cake, than to drag myself to the gym. Especially since I work on my feet and I'm always tired anyway.

I mentioned I liked a certain watch when we were at a mall. When we were back in the car, he suddenly needed to buy something for his sister from a mall close by. While he went and looked for what he needed, I was just window shopping. The. He came by holding a bag and told me to open it. Inside was the watch. I loved the gesture so much, it wasn't even about the watch. The best thing was that he did it just so he could see my face when I opened it.
